data.name: FINAL FANTASY XIV Online Free Trial
data.detailed_description:
Take part in an epic and ever-changing FINAL FANTASY as you adventure and explore with friends from around the world! Experience all the hallmarks of the best-selling franchise - airships, chocobos, moogles, and more.

In the updated Free Trial version of the FINAL FANTASY XIV, you’ll now be able to play as your favorite FINAL FANTASY class up to level 35.
Form a party and adventure with a multitude of players from across the globe.
Forge friendships, mount chocobos, and board airships as you and your companions create your own unique stories in Eorzea.
Set out alone or enlist the aid of friends as you undertake epic quests, battle familiar FINAL FANTASY monsters, and acquire unique abilities and equipment.
All the classic elements from the series that you have come to know and love are waiting!

Embark on the adventure of a lifetime to help reforge the fate of Eorzea.

Note:
FINAL FANTASY XIV Online game packages available on Steam may only be registered and added on a Square Enix account that has the base game “FINAL FANTASY XIV Online Starter Edition" (or formerly known as "FINAL FANTASY XIV: A Realm Reborn”) purchased on Steam.

data.short_description: Take part in an epic and ever-changing FINAL FANTASY as you adventure and explore with friends from around the world! Experience all the hallmarks of the best-selling franchise - airships, chocobos, moogles, and more.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“one of the most enchanting MMORPG settings ever.”
39 / 40 – 週刊ファミ通

“a great MMORPG experience”
8.6 / 10 – IGN

“One of the best takes on the MMO experience I’ve ever seen”
92 / 100 – Ten Ton Hammer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 32/64 bit, Windows® 8.1 32/64 bit, Windows® 10 32/64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™i5 2.4GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720: NVIDIA® Geforce® GTX750 or higher, AMD Radeon™ R7 260X or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound® sound card (DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
  • Additional Notes: System Requirements may be subject to change. If you are using a router, make sure you have the following ports set up to allow game packets to pass through. TCP Ports: 80, 443, 54992-54994, 55006-55007, 55021-55040
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7 64 bit, Windows® 8.1 64 bit, Windows® 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™i7 3GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080: NVIDIA® Geforce® GTX970 or higher AMD Radeon™ RX 480 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound® sound card (DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
  • Additional Notes: System Requirements may be subject to change. If you are using a router, make sure you have the following ports set up to allow game packets to pass through. TCP Ports: 80, 443, 54992-54994, 55006-55007, 55021-55040
